In India there is an enormous gap between healthcare supply and demand. What do you think are the major steps that can be taken by the government to improve patient care in the country?
                    I am not completely against it but i equally support the health care system.i mean,i am for it and against it depending upon the situations which exist.

       I think few major steps that should be taken by the government to improve patient care in the country:

Government should conduct few awareness programmes in order to educate and make them aware about the healthcare facilities extended by the govt and hospitals.

Its better to provide few healthcare services at the time of emergencies at home itself by the doctors.

"Treating the patient does not give life,it should give guildance about the health"

      I mean the hospitals and the doctors must provide guildance regarding how to take care at present and even furthur in the future.

Government should provide free medication and medicines,if not,its better if it provides few offers,discounts on it. 

Govt authorities must focus much on private hospitals,regulate few important rules and regulations and make them to follow very strictly in order to save the life.

The quality of the hospitals and also the medication should be improved in govt. hospitals.

Hospitals must appoint highly specialised and experienced doctors.if not,it should try to train them intellectually through which both the doctors and patients get benefits.

Government must focus on rural areas rather than urban areas because the situation and the healthcare supply and demand and other facilities in rural areas are very bad.they are facing a lot of problems and there lives are going into air very painfully.

                 At the same time i support the government because the facilities providing by the govt. are much better when compared to private authorities.

           "FEW THINGS MAKES US MORE COMFORTABLE AND GIVES US A LOT OF SATISFACTION BUT IT DOES NOT DESERVE ANY VALUE IN IT"

                   -It is applicable to private hospitals.

                   "FEW THINGS MAKES US VERY LESS COMFORTABLE AND GIVES US VERY LESS SATISFACTION BUT IT REALLY DO DESERVE SOME REAL VALUE IN IT"

                 It is applicable to government hospitals.

In private hospitals,more charges,less life savings.

In govt. hospitals,less charges,more life savings.

           i am not saying it is 100% applicable but this situation exist upto maximum extent.

For example:

                  If a person met with an accident,its very emergency to join him in the hospital.           In case of private hospitals,the victim will be joined and treated properly according to the quantity and the quality of the money which they pay.

In case of govt. hospitals,the victim will be joined immediately and treated well irrespective of the money. 

           So finally,i would like to conclude it by few words.If govt. takes care and try to create and implement few important,intellectual and useful strategies regarding the healthcare demand,supply and other healthcare facilities,it can contribute maximum to the well-being of the people,society,country and even it helps globally.This may leads to our country's development.

                                                  THANK YOU.
